STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:NotTargetted() filter:AddSubType( LAND_TYPE_MOUNTAIN ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetController( Object():GetOwner() ) if filter:CountStopAt( 1 ) > 0 then if FilteredCard() ~= nil then FilteredCard():GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_HASTE, 1 ) end end
